articles.title: Football: Guardiola exorcises Champions League demons to lead Man City to first final - CNA
articles.description: After a decade of disappointment, Pep Guardiola is back in a Champions League final and just one game away from delivering on his task to make Manchester City champions of Europe for the first time.
